ygData.messageBody:
>
> Message: 1
> Date: Sat, 30 Sep 2000 15:43:45 -0000
> From: "L. Kristine" <ladykristine@...>
> Subject: Need help/advice for new items
>
> Hello all!
>
> I have been very busy in Kunark lately and need some
> help with some
> odd items I have found.
> Looking to see if there are quests, recipes, skills
> that use these
> items so I can either sell them or give them to
> someone who can use
> them (and they sure are filling up in the bank!)
>
> *denotes a foraged item
>
> Froglok Escort Fife
> *Petrified Redwood
> Busted Froglok Slave Shackles
> Forsaken Pariah Mask
> Ticket Stub
> Lens of Sorts
> *Craked Shell
> *Hopeless Willow Moss
> *Cursed Clover of Viesar�if I eat this does my
> charisma go down
> or
> something?
> *Maneater Bud
> *Wild Radish
> *Wild Cabbage
> Rhino Hoof
> Sarnak Blood
>
> Thanks in advance for any help on these�
>
> Teaa
> Cazic-Thule

The sarnak blood is used in blacksmithing, used to die
things black when you forge it.. Don't ask me why
Sarnak blood is black :)

Froglok Escort Fife is used in a Cabilis quest, some
newbie 'collection' quest..
Thats my 2cp...

Kalvarin, 42 Paladin -- Kadien, 23 Rogue
Erollisi Marr
